results.title: Can metformin modulate the retinal degenerative changes in a rat model of retinitis pigmentosa?
results.text_hl: Can @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ modulate the @DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal degenerative changes@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@retinitis pigmentosa@@@?

results.title: Effects of medications on hypoxia-inducible factor in the retina: A review.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Digoxin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004077 @@@Digoxin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @GENE_HIF1A @GENE_3091 @@@HIF-1@@@  inhibitors, and deferoxamine and  -ketoglutarate analogues, @GENE_HIF1A @GENE_3091 @@@HIF-1@@@  activators, are being studied for application in @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@age-related macular degeneration@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@retinitis pigmentosa@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim AH, Kolesnikova M, Ngo WK, Tsang SH. Effects of medications on hypoxia-inducible factor in the retina: A review. Clin Exp Ophthalmol. 2023 Jan 3;():. PMID: 36594241

results.title: Rescue of Retinal Degeneration in rd1 Mice by Intravitreally Injected Metformin
results.text_hl: Microglial activation in the outer nuclear layer (ONL) of the retina of rd1 @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ was significantly suppressed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. RNA-Seq showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ markedly downregulated @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ genes and upregulated the expression of crystallin proteins, which have been demonstrated to be important neuroprotective molecules in the retina, revealing the therapeutic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@RP@@@ treatment. alphaA-crystallin proteins were further confirmed to be involved in the neuroprotective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a Ca2+ ionophore-damaged 661W photoreceptor-like cell line.

citations.NLM: A L, Zou T, He J, Chen X, Sun D, Fan X, Xu H. Rescue of Retinal Degeneration in rd1 Mice by Intravitreally Injected Metformin Front Mol Neurosci. 2019;12():102. PMID: 31080404
citations.BibTeX: @article{31080404, title={Rescue of Retinal Degeneration in rd1 Mice by Intravitreally Injected Metformin}, author={A L and Zou T and He J and Chen X and Sun D and Fan X and Xu H}, journal={Front Mol Neurosci}, volume={12}, pages={102}}

results.title: AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem.
results.text_hl: We investigated whether activation of 5' adenosine monophosphate protein kinase (AMPK) is protective to the retina in several preclinical @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models of @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ and found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced activation of AMPK was able to delay or prevent @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@ in the @CELLLINE_CVCL:0028 @@@rd10@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Retinitis_Pigmentosa</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012174 @@@retinitis pigmentosa@@@, the @CHEMICAL_sodium_iodate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C032285 @@@NaIO3@@@ model of @CELLLINE_CVCL:4388 @@@RPE@@@ and @DISEASE_Retinitis @DISEASE_MESH:D012173 @@@retinal injury@@@, and the @DISEASE_Photophobia @DISEASE_MESH:D020795 @@@light damage@@@ model of @DISEASE_Retinal_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D012162 @@@retinal degeneration@@@.

citations.NLM: Brown EE, Lewin AS, Ash JD. AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem. Adv Exp Med Biol. 2019;1185():477-481. PMID: 31884657
citations.BibTeX: @article{31884657, title={AMPK May Play an Important Role in the Retinal Metabolic Ecosystem.}, author={Brown EE and Lewin AS and Ash JD}, journal={Adv Exp Med Biol}, volume={1185}, pages={477-481}}
